title: Aishwarya Rai's father Krishnaraj Rai's funeral held, celebs pay last respects - Times of India

locations.name: vile parle seva sansthan shamshan bhoomi

text: Aishwarya Rai's father Krishnaraj Rai's funeral held, celebs pay last respects The funeral took place around 8.30 PM at Vile Parle Seva. PTI | Updated: Mar 19, 2017, 09.50 AM IST Aishwarya Rai's father Krishnaraj Rai's funeral held, celebs pay last respects Actress Aishwarya Rai Bachchan's father Krishnaraj Rai passed away today at a suburban hospital here due to health issues. Rai was hospitalised a few weeks ago and later shifted to the ICU. He was reportedly battling cancer. "Aishwarya's father Krishnaraj Rai passed away at the Lilavati Hospital in suburban Bandra," the publicist of the actress had told . The funeral took place around 8.30 PM at Vile Parle Seva Sansthan Shamshan Bhoomi where Aishwarya's father-in-law Amitabh Bachchan also offered prayers. Krishnaraj Rai is survived by wife Vrinda, son Aditya and Aishwarya. A host of celebrities including actors Shah Rukh Khan, Kunal Kapoor and filmmakers Sanjay Leela Bhansali, Ashutosh Gowariker paid their last respects to Aishwarya's father.
